title: Ordinary least squares - Wikipedia
snippet:
In statistics, ordinary least squares (OLS) is a type of linear least squares method 
for estimating the unknown parameters in a linear regression model.

title: Least squares inference in phylogeny - Wikipedia
snippet:

observed matrix of pairwise genetic distances and optionally a weight matrix.

title: Regularized least squares - Wikipedia
snippet:
Regularized least squares (RLS) is a family of methods for solving the least-
squares problem while using regularization to further constrain the resulting 
solution.

title: Least squares adjustment - Wikipedia
snippet:

system of equations based on the principle of least squares of observation 
residuals.
